name: Paper Cut (penguinies)
description:
Description

Paper Cut is a short platformer game where you play as a pencil! Equipped with a gravity gun, manipulate the gravity of the objects around you to launch them at the evil paper shredders!

Note: The escape key is currently used to open and close the in-game menu, but itch.io also uses it to exit full screen. This awkward interaction was unintentional and it can be annoying, sorry in advance!

Tutorial

  • Walk around using WASD
  • Jump using space
  • Change the direction that the gravity gun will move objects in using left shift
  • Shoot with the gravity gun by clicking the left mouse button

Contributions

Hailey Tran - Programmer

Judith No - Artist

Sean Zeng - Programmer
